howItWorks.title: How SiegeMind works
howItWorks.subtitle: From raw match data to actionable insights. Here's how SiegeMind transforms your gameplay

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: SiegeMind automatically captures your match data, including kills, deaths, operators used, and round outcomes.

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing
dataProcessing.description: Our AI analyzes your performance patterns, identifying strengths, weaknesses, and improvement opportunities.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Advanced algorithms provide personalized insights and coaching recommendations based on your unique playstyle.

actionableInsights.title: Actionable Insights
actionableInsights.description: Receive detailed reports with specific recommendations to improve your gameplay and climbing performance.
